original_title: Ruwini Weliwita promoted to Sales General Manager at Informatics
original_body_lines: Informatics Ltd., a leader in IT banking and IT Infrastructure solutions and managed services, has announced the promotion of Ruwini Weliwita to the role of Sales General Manager.
This appointment highlights IPL’s commitment to fostering internal excellence and leveraging the remarkable talent within its organisation.

Weliwita’s appointment within the company has been nothing short of extraordinary. Her exceptional leadership, dedication, and transformative impact on the sales strategies have been instrumental in propelling Informatics’ growth trajectory forward. Her promotion to General Manager - Sales is a testament to her proven track record, innovative thinking, consistent results in driving sales growth and successful delivery. Under her leadership, the organisation has flourished, achieving remarkable milestones that have positively impacted Informatics’ business and clients.

Informatics Group Managing Director Hiran Wickramasinghe said: “With great excitement, we proudly announce the promotion of Ruwini as our new Sales General Manager. Her unwavering dedication and commitment to the organisation and our clients has been pivotal in reshaping our sales strategies and driving growth. As Sales General Manager, Ruwini will continue to inspire and lead our sales team, bringing a fresh perspective and an unyielding commitment to excellence. Ruwini’s promotion is a significant milestone not only for her but for us as a whole. It exemplifies our progressive approach to talent management and highlights our commitment to nurturing and promoting exceptional individuals within our organisation. Her journey serves as an inspiration and a testament to the remarkable potential that resides within our company.”
